name: type.today screen shooter
description:
Type.today screen shooter helps you to find the best font for your project from the type.today library.


Type.today and tomorrow are two showcases — two collections. We’re engaged in assembling modern tools for text layout. Plus we select fonts with high-quality Cyrillic letters that best reflect the visual language of the present and the near future. These are the work of both well-known authors and designers of the next generation.


How to use:

1. Select a text object

2. Run the plugin

3. Select a font

4. Paste font sample on canvas


The plugin will update your text object to a PNG image with a font sample.


NOTE: Plugin provided only demo versions of fonts without some symbols. Font samples are available only for testing and not for commercial use. You can buy full versions on https://type.today and https://tomorrow.type.today
